programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: After an assassination attempt is made on Shen Yu Fei, Ye Wen Jie encourages her to leave for safety. Ye Wen Jie brings Wang Miao to visit the long-abandoned Hong'an Base.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie continures her story and reveals the true purpose of the base was to search for extraterrestrial civilizations. After bidding goodbye to Wang Miao, Ye Wen Jie stays and watches the sunset, as if waiting for something.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao meets Shi Qiang to exchange the information they have obtained, and Shi Qiang does not believe that everything was coincidence. The two set off back to Beijing, and ask Xu Bing Bing to continue investigating Shen Yufei's whereabouts.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wei Cheng tells the story of how his obsession with trying to solve the Three-Body calculation led him to marry Shen Yu Fei and how he received threats on his life from Pan Han should he try to discontinue solvng the problem.

programme.title: My Dad
programme.desc: When a father and daughter magically switch bodies, they learn to overcome their differences and understand each other in the process of pursuing each other's dreams.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Invited by Taiwanese immigrant couple Ming and Michelle Hsu, Noelle gets to hear their memories of Taiwanese Bento Box while tasting classic Taiwanese street food.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: With the slogan of "No lines, no checkout", Amazon Go opens its sixth store in the financial district of San Francisco. Our hosts visited the store to get first-hand experience.

programme.title: Detective Dee and the Dragon of Fire
programme.desc: The newly constructed Luoyang Palace is set ablaze by a divine dragon during the night, leaving the carpenter either dead or missing. Di Renjie, breaking the norms, is promoted to the position of Deputy Minister of the Supreme Court to investigate the case but encounters obstacles from a mysterious force.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Chinese artifacts at the Art Institute of Chicago are brought to life through advanced technology, which enhances their ancient beauty and seamlessly merges tradition with innovation.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan encourages a depressed Wang Shu to regain his confidence.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: The housekeeper is shocked to find Xiao Qi mutilating himself with poison.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Sau-yi tells the story of switching kids.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Rewind six months, and Hon-yeung agonizes over the issue of the selection of a trustee.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi hoped everyone would return to Hangtian City for Guan Chao's wedding, but they all turned down the invitation. She returns to Hangtian City alone and is surprised to find Zhuang Yuan has rushed back too.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Huang Ying Zi and Zhuang Yuan hear that Guan Chao's parents won't be attending his wedding. Huang Ying Zi decides to come up with ideas to convince Guan Chao's father.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Si Yuan tries to help her parents reconcile; Chen Shi accommodates but continues to think of Yu Ting and secretly keeps in touch with her. After dinner, Chen Shi makes up an excuse to look for Yu Ting and Lin Li is heartbroken. Dong Sheng feels heartache over Lin Li's predicament and decides to protect her.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Wen Yu does a livestream in a restaurant to introduce new products. Netizens suggest that she watches Chen Ming's livestream after they sense that she is not in a good mood. Chen Ming helps Wen Yu, causing her to feel awkward and hoping that she will not bump into him again.

programme.title: Detective Dee and the Dragon of Fire
programme.desc: The newly constructed Luoyang Palace is set ablaze by a divine dragon during the night, leaving the carpenter either dead or missing. Di Renjie, breaking the norms, is promoted to the position of Deputy Minister of the Supreme Court to investigate the case but encounters obstacles from a mysterious force.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Feng and Shane share how they created the Szechuan Noodle brand that received recognition from the western world, including big names such as Jonathan Gold.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: To understand the personalities of the locals, you have to dive into their food and culture. Chef Li introduces Noelle to sea cucumber.
